Lolicon isn't synonymous with pedophilia you absolute fucking idiot. Regardless of the context.

I think keko is retarded and has no idea what the affix "con" means. Normally, it means to be against something, like in contradict. The suffix in lolicon, though, does NOT have the same origin. In this case, it comes from a Japanese shortening of COMplex, where the m cant appear at the end of a syllable in japanese, so it turned into n.
It's be fine if this was their only mistake, except that in japan, lolicon is synonymous with pedophile, except in anime contexts. While the western world took that anime meaning and left the other for the word pedophile. Essentially, keko got literally everything wrong and is retarded, though hopefully well intentioned

There are two separate types of lolicon. Very confusing yes, I know.

There's the original Japanese Lolicon. These ones are against paedophilia and actively try to remove it from society.

Then there's the western adaptation of the word. These ones are just pedo's that should be hunted down and have 

there head's placed on a spike in the town square.


Fun fact : Lolicon(western) is one of the only words in the english language that doesn't mean to be against it when adding "con" at the end of the base word.
